entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
